plot: In a last ditch attempt to save his recently inherited art gallery, Marc follows a notorious street artist though Downtown Los Angeles for a one-night adventure that teaches him about the ephemerality of life and art.
title: Paste
plot_es: In a last ditch attempt to save his recently inherited art gallery, Marc follows a notorious street artist though Downtown Los Angeles for a one-night adventure that teaches him about the ephemerality of life and art.
plot_en: In a last ditch attempt to save his recently inherited art gallery, Marc follows a notorious street artist though Downtown Los Angeles for a one-night adventure that teaches him about the ephemerality of life and art.
